column1: harry rex hayes| harry rex hayes. born: october 01
column3: 2015 harry rex hayes passed away friday
column6: colorado. rex as born on october 1
column7: 1945 in pueblo to earl and june hayes. he loved to cook and to fish in the mountain lakes of colorado. he was preceded in death by his parents and his brother carl hayes. his survivors include several family members and friends. cremation has taken place. no public services are planned. send sympathy card print name location email personal message hide emailenter personal message here too difficult to read? reload. type the text in order submit guest book entry .
